
# Tally.xyz


Tally builds safe, neutral and open governance infrastructure for the most valuable protocols and infrastructure running on Ethereum and Solana. 

### What is Tally?
Tally provides tools and infrastructure for creating and managing onchain DAOs on Ethereum and other EVM networks. Protocols like [Arbitrum](https://www.tally.xyz/gov/arbitrum), [Optimism](https://www.tally.xyz/gov/optimism), [ENS](https://www.tally.xyz/gov/ens), [Uniswap](https://www.tally.xyz/gov/uniswap), [AAVE](https://www.tally.xyz/gov/aave) and [hundreds of others](https://www.tally.xyz/explore) use Tally to share control of their most important smart contracts.

### What tools does Tally offer?
- The [tally.xyz](https://tally.xyz/) webapp offers a user-friendly interface for launching and running DAOs. Tally helps DAOs thrive by making it easy to launch DAOs, create and pass proposals, and manage treasuries.

- The [Tally API](https://docs.tally.xyz/user-guides/welcome) ([docs](https://apidocs.tally.xyz/)) makes it easy to query DAO data. List DAOs, their proposals, and their delegates. Use the API to build notifications, dig into voter data or build governance right into your game or app.

- [Tally Zero](https://zero.tally.xyz/) ([repo](https://github.com/withtally/tally-zero)) is a decentralized voting application with minimal dependencies for onchain voting.

- [Tally's Governor deployer tool](https://github.com/withtally/gov-deployer) makes it easy to deploy a Governor DAO

### What smart contracts does Tally support?

#### OpenZeppelin Govenor

Tally integrates with the [OpenZeppelin Governor](https://docs.openzeppelin.com/contracts/5.x/governance) smart contracts. OZ Governor is the most secure, modular and battle-tested implementation of EVM governance. 

Get started with an interactive [example](https://wizard.openzeppelin.com/#governor](https://remix.ethereum.org/?#&lang=en&optimize=false&runs=200&evmVersion=null&version=soljson-v0.8.24+commit.e11b9ed9.js)https://remix.ethereum.org/?#&lang=en&optimize=false&runs=200&evmVersion=null&version=soljson-v0.8.24+commit.e11b9ed9.js) in Remix, or customize your own governance contracts with [OpenZeppelin Wizard](https://wizard.openzeppelin.com/#governor).

Learn more at [Tally Docs](docs.tally.xyz)

#### MultiGov

[MultiGov](https://docs.tally.xyz/premium-features/multigov) is an extension to OpenZeppelin Governor built by Scopelift and Wormhole for multichain governance.
